rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see schools use solar panels, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to enable this.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. You'd also need to provide your full name.
